text: Keeper Security is a zero-knowledge cybersecurity platform for password management and privileged access management.
KeeperAI uses machine learning to detect insider threats by analyzing privileged session commands in real-time.
FedRAMP authorization allows Keeper to serve hundreds of government customers with compliant security solutions.
ARAM events capture gateway-level session activity for behavioral analysis and anomaly detection.
The system can autonomously terminate privileged sessions when critical risk levels are detected.
This is a test entry with missing metadata field
Zero-trust architecture requires continuous verification of user identity and device security posture.
